verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lift your vision high;
We're in a way we've never been before.
So lift your vision higher
And you shall see the glory of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though there be trials and testings
In the world around you there is war.
Though Satan's forces try to defeat you
Have courage for the battle is the Lord's.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Rise up in strength in the Spirit,
For we wrestle not against flesh and blood
But against principalities and powers.
Rise up and be strong ye sons of God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Be free and soar as the eagle
Who can see the earth with watchful eye.
For without a vision the people perish.
You must grow in the Spirit and not die.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For we shall be overcomers,
Conquering over sickness, death, and sin.
Press on ye sons, sing the Victor's Song.
We've won the battle by God's Spirit life within.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Levanta tu visión
En camino nuevo vamos ya
Levanta tu visión más alto
Y tu verás la gloria del Señor.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Aunque hayan luchas y problemas
En este mundo hay pruebas en derredor
Aunque Satanás con sus fuerzas
Trate de engañarte, sé valiente
La victoria es del Señor.
